alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 12 at 3:43AM EDT until April 12 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN CONNECTICUT... The National Weather Service in Upton has issued a Red Flag Warning for Southern Connecticut which is in effect from 10 AM this morning to 7 PM EDT this evening. The Red Flag Warning is no longer in effect for the day on Thursday. ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN CONNECTICUT... * AFFECTED AREA...Northern Fairfield, Northern New Haven, Northern Middlesex, Northern New London, Southern Fairfield, Southern New Haven, Southern Middlesex and Southern New London. * TIMING...Late Wednesday morning into Wednesday evening. * WINDS...Northwest 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 28 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the upper 60s. * LIGHTNING...none. * IMPACTS...rapid fire spread if ignition occurs.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are expected or occurring. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels will create a significantly elevated fire growth potential.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
